mapper.insert: insert into tuser (sUserCode, sBankCode, sUserName, sPassword, sUserState, sUserLevel, sUserOnTime, sPWDError, sTelephone, sEmail) values (#{susercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sbankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{susername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suserstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suserlevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suserontime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{spwderror,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{stelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{semail,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tuser set sBankCode = #{sbankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sUserName = #{susername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sPassword = #{spassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sUserState = #{suserstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sUserLevel = #{suserlevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sUserOnTime = #{suserontime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sPWDError = #{spwderror,jdbcType=TINYINT}, sTelephone = #{stelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sEmail = #{semail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sUserCode = #{susercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select sUserCode, sBankCode, sUserName, sPassword, sUserState, sUserLevel, sUserOnTime, sPWDError, sTelephone, sEmail from tuser where sUserCode = #{susercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select sUserCode, sBankCode, sUserName, sPassword, sUserState, sUserLevel, sUserOnTime, sPWDError, sTelephone, sEmail from tuser
